content: molly s hats materials abbreviations  one skein lion brand wool ease solids bobble = bind off & heathers 80% acrylic 20% wool co = cast on 197yds/180m per 85g  us 8 / 5 0mm 16 circular needle k = knit  us 9 / 5 5mm 16 circular needle and k2tog = knit two together dpns p = purl  tapestry needle to weave in ends sl = slip_stitch sts = stitches gauge 20 sts x 26 row = 4 © 2011 robyn devine - http //www minimalistknitter com directions using smaller needles co 80 sts row 1-10 *k2 p2* repeat to end of round row 11 switch to larger needles and k around row 12 *k1 p1* around row 13 k around repeat row 12 & 13 until hat measures 9-10 from co edge vary your length to vary how slouchy this hat ends up decreases row 1 k2tog around 40 stitches row 2 k around row 3 k2tog around 20 stitches row 4 k around row 5 k2tog around 10 stitches break yarn weave thread through all live stitches and weave in ends © 2011 robyn devine - http //www minimalistknitter com
